doc.title: Between Two Worlds
doc.plot: Ayu, a beautiful young Balinese dancer abandons her village and her Balinese boyfriend, Sidi, to fall in love with alluring Italian American, Stefano. She flirts with love, death and self destruction on her journey toward awakening between worlds of light and dark, love and loss, her village and the new global culture, all of which takes place amongst the Gods, the rice fields, the tourist meccas of a Balinese Paradise!
